outputs.output_descr:
1.1.1.1 The Strategy or the Development of Samoa (SDS), 2008- 2011 aligned with MDG targets and indicators and linked to national budget.

1.1.1.1.1 Toolkits on MDG budgeting and costing and aid coordination contributing effectively to the delivery of the Strategy for the Development of Samoa (SDS), 2008-2011.

1.2.1.1 Strengthened and harmonized national and regional statistical information systems and databases, including development information (DEVINFO) focusing on sex disaggregated data.

3.1.1.1. National disaster response systems implemented and strengthened through national and village-based disaster response drills.

3.1.1.2 Gender-responsive disaster risk management plans at the community levels integrated into National Disaster Plans and United Nations programmes.

4.1.1.1. An engendered "environment hub" of international, regional and Samoa-based experts supported to provide coordinated and gender sensitive policy and technical advice on serious environmental challenges facing the Pacific.

4.1.1.3 Gender analysis conducted on the differential impacts on men and women of environmental degradation and natural disasters.

4.1.1.4. Energy efficiency improved and renewable energy use promoted.

4.2.1.1. Protected and conservation area management and governance systems strengthened.

4.2.2.1. Engendered MDG-based village and local level sustainable development plans developed and implemented by communities.

project_title: Samoa Community Centred Sustainable Development Project
